Text: 1Gb update? the fuck? There arent that many bugs in the game for 1gb wtf.. only problems I had was cutscene freezes and bug in the begining where you cant move after going to a new area.. thats like something that only needs around 10mb

Update is worthless the bat file included has the wrong path, so if u dont know how to edit a bat file ur game will be with no texture and lighting.
DONT DOWNLOAD IT, i made it work and it doesnt improve anything. 
The actual update reduce load times on fast PC and gameplay balance, like the demon dodge got nerfed bad.
